statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if [ -d "$dir/.git" ]; then cd "$dir"; branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-branch'); if git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then status='clean'; else status='dirty'; fi; printf '%s [%s:%s]' "$dir" "$branch" "$status"; else printf '%s' "$dir"; fi
